obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_59: * UEE HEE^1!&* VISITORS^1, VISITORS^1!&* NOW WE CAN PLAY^1, PLAY!/
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_60: * THEN^1, AFTER YOU^1, I CAN PLAY WITH EVERYONE ELSE^1, TOO!/
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_62: * So what are we playing^1, exactly...?/
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_64: \TJ* OH^1, IT'S JUST A SIMPLE NUMBERS GAME./%
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_14: * WHEN YOUR HP DROPS TO 0^1, YOU LOSE!/
* So that's the kinda game you wanna play^1, huh...?/
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_17: * You're dealing with a couple of sharks./%
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_19: * UEE HEE HEE^1! SHARK-TO-SHARK^1! I WOULDN'T HAVE IT ANY OTHER WAY!/
* NOW^1, NOW!^1!&* LET THE GAMES BEGIN!!/%
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_29: * BUT THERE ARE YET FASTER^1, YET STRONGER./
* THE HAND OF THE KNIGHT IS DRIFTING FORWARD./
* SOON^1, THE "QUEEN" RETURNS^1, AND HELL'S ROAR BUBBLES FROM THE DEPTHS.../
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_30: * EITHER WAY^1, A MISCHIEF-MISCHIEF^1, A CHAOS-CHAOS...!/
* LIGHTNERS^1!&* FROM INSIDE YOUR LITTLE CELL!!/
* TAKE ME AND DO YOUR STRONGEST---!/%
* WHAT FUN!!^1!&* I'M EXHAUSTED!!^1!&* YOU KIDS TIRED ME UP!!/
* NOW I WILL SLEEP FOR THE OTHER 100 YEARS./
* UNFORTUNATELY, YOU KIDS CANNOT HAVE SUCH A PLEASANT DREAM./
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_31: * FROM NOW^1, A NIGHTMARE WILL AWAKEN IN YOUR HEARTS./
* IN THE SHADOW OF THE KNIGHT'S HAND.../
* EITHER WAY^1, A MISCHIEF-MISCHIEF^1, A CHAOS-CHAOS...!/
* LIGHTNERS^1!&* FROM INSIDE YOUR LITTLE CELL!!/
* TAKE THIS AND DO YOUR STRONGEST---!/%
obj_jokerbattleevent_slash_Step_0_gml_34: * (A strange chest appeared outside the room...)/%
